price: ߝߏ߫ ߓߙߌ߬ߛߌ߫، ߏ ߞߵߊ߬ ߓߊ߲߬ ߞߍߞߏ ߡߊ߬ ߕߌ߲ߓߌߘߌ߲ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߫ ߝߍ߬
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
